ARABIC: ٱدْعُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ تَضَرُّعًا وَخُفْيَةً إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُعْتَدِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Call on your Lord humbly and secretly. He does not love those who overstep the limits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Pray to your Lord in humility and unseen. He does not love the iniquitous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Call upon your Lord with humility and in secret. Surely He does not love transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Pray to your Lord humbly and privately. God does not love the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Pray to your Lord crying humbly, and softly; indeed He does not love the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Invoke your Lord Tadarru`an and Khufyah. He likes not the aggressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Call on your Lord humbly and secretly; surely He does not love those who exceed the limits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Call on your Lord, humbly and secretly; He loves not transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (O mankind!) Call upon your Lord humbly and in secret. Lo! He loveth not aggressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Call on your Lord with humility and in secret, He does not love the transgressors:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Call on Your Lord in humility and in secrecy; verily He approveth not the trespassers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Supplicate your Lord, beseechingly and secretly. Indeed, He does not like the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Call on your Lord with humility and in private: for Allah loveth not those who trespass beyond bounds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Invoke your Lord with humility and in secret. He likes not the aggressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Supplicate to your Lord with humility and in secret. He does not love the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Call upon your Lord humbly and privately. He does not love the aggressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Call upon your Lord in humility and privately; indeed, He does not like transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:55] Call upon your Lord humbly (tadarru‘an is a circumstantial qualifier), in subservience, and quietly, in secret. Truly, He loves not the aggressors, who are braggarts and loud-mouthed in [their] supplications.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((0 mankind!) Call upon your Lord humbly) openly (and in secret) it is also said that this means: call upon your Lord humbly and out of fear. (Lo! He loveth not aggressors) in their supplications, by calling for that which is not permissible for them against the righteous.
